selected_quotes: Two responses to the recent article on evidence complacency in conservation decision making
Embrace complexity to improved #conservation decision making. #sciencepolicy
Political decision-making is never simple, conservation is no exception. Interesting piece
Two interesting responses on evid. complacency
Science cannot be the only input into political decision-making, there are other considerations. Nice, @megcevans
